short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will play a sound for each (advertising) tracker on a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trackers that that collect your data are often hidden. With this Chrome Extension, a small sound is played whenever a page sends data to an (advertising) tracker.  It's purpose is to make you more aware of the data that is being collected when you casually browse the web.
